data.name: Horror Bar VR
data.detailed_description:
ğŸ¹ FEATURES ğŸ¹

ğŸ’€ Top-notch graphic design - making the zombie world fun and attractive
ğŸ’€ Complex interactions with the clients - based on well-prepared and customized animations with real clientsâ€™ reactions to the playerâ€™s behavior
ğŸ’€ Well-composed soundtrack made by highly-acclaimed composer MikoÅ‚aj StroiÅ„ski - the rhythm and pace of the music progress as you progress through the game
ğŸ’€ Dynamic gameplay boosted by custom-made sound effects
ğŸ’€ Universal artificial language of zombies designed especially for playersâ€™ entertainment
ğŸ’€ Skill & Fun - achieve the best possible results discovering new mechanics and dishes, try not to fail, earn money, get rid of bats, spiders, but most of all... have some fun
ğŸ’€ Unlock new mechanics, dishes, and characters as you progress through new levels
ğŸ’€ Serve disgusting dishes and confront with zombiesâ€™ fail or success reaction
ğŸ’€ Mess up with zombie-client with unique items such as the baseball bat.

ğŸ¹ SUMMARY ğŸ¹

ğŸ’€Taking on the role of a bartender in the Horror Bar simulator you will be serving among other horrifyingly delicious full blood drinks, using 3 different mixing methods.

ğŸ’€ Earn money, get tips, buy unique items from various collections and pimp your bar

ğŸ’€To face the appetite of your guest coming into your bar, you will be creating some gruesome dishes! Chop gluttonous monsters living at the bottom of the aquarium, fry cut fingers as french fries, but also take care of serving properly fried steaks from meat of an unknown source...

ğŸ’€Beware! You may also be up for a challenge to cook a meal from dead rats, which are considered a real yummy delicacy here.

ğŸ’€With each level you will immerse yourself in the more and more incredible atmosphere of the game. You will also get to learn more interesting techniques to serve even more zombies coming into your bar.

ğŸ’€Thanks to stationary nature of the game - gameplay is 100% free of dizziness, sickness or headaches.

data.short_description: ğŸ¹ Horror Bar is an incredibly engaging Zombie Bar simulator where you can take on the role of bartender and serve your scarily nice customers multiple crazy dishes and drinks. ğŸ¹
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64bit
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: CPU: Intel i7-6700k equivalent or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: VR ONLY!

highlighted.name: Shut up and take my money
